title: Component 1: Institutional Strengthening at the District Levels for Planning, Delivering, and Monitoring of Skill Development Programmes
1.1 DSC has been constituted and has started its functions of planning and monitoring skill development efforts
Planning

rubric_options.text: NO evidence of DSC planning - DSDP not made
DSC has prepared a DSDP but not as per process. Complete DSDP not available
NA
DSC has prepared DSDP in detailed annual work plan and submitted to SSDM within stipulated time
NA
DSC has reviewed its performance against a prepared annual workplan and taken corrective action

evidence_needed: Copy of DSDP made, copy of submission letter/ mail. MoM showing corrective actions, copy of report

title: Monitoring

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which monitoring was undertaken and reports prepared
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres at District

evidence_needed: Copy of DSDP made, copy of submission letter/ mail. MoM showing corrective actions, copy of report
rubric_level_descriptions: At least 10% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done
10% to 30% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done
30% to 50% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done
50% to 70% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done
70% to 90% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done
more than 90% of the centres have been monitored and report prepared and appropriate escalations done

title: Data on capacity, infra and its utilisation, trades and schemes offered by each training centre...

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which requisite data is available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres at District

evidence_needed: Data collection format shared with all centres and program managers. - mail from DC office if necessary. Data to be part of quarterly report shared by the Training Centre. DSC prepares summary reports based on data provided by Training Centres. Corrective actions are discussed in DSC meetings and recorded in the MoM
rubric_level_descriptions: for less than 50% of the centres
for more than 50% but less than 60%
for more than 60% but less than 70%
for more than 70% but less than 80%
for more than 80% but less than 90%
for more than 90% of the centres

title: 1.3 Cost per Candidate
Percentage of Centres operational in district for which data on cost per certified candidate calculated...

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which comprehensive data for year is available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres operational in the district

evidence_needed: Number of students trained (Total, SC, ST, Minority, Women, General), trade wise, faculty wise...

title: Percentage of Centres operational in district for which data on Cost per trainee retained in job...

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which comprehensive data for year is available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres operational in the district

evidence_needed: Number of students M3 retention in job...

title: Ratio of Cost per Candidate placed to Cost allowed in Common Cost norms

inputs.var_a_label: Weighted average Cost per candidate placed
inputs.var_b_label: Weighted average Cost allowed in common cost norms

title: Annual Performance Report

rubric_options.text: Not made
Comprehensive report Made and submitted to SSDM and District Admin

evidence_needed: Copy of report, submission mail

title: Component 2: Improved Quality and Market Relevance of Skill Development Programs
2.1 Data on Performance of TVET Players
Percentage of Centres operational in district for which data on students enrolled... available

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which comprehensive enrolment details are available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres operational in district

evidence_needed: List of centres in district, Data on enrolments...

title: Percentage of Centres operational in district for which data on students assessed and certified... available

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which comprehensive assessment details are available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres operational in district

evidence_needed: List of centres in district, Data on student certification...

title: 2.2 Quality of Performance
District has a functional mechanism for capturing student feedback and takes corrective action

inputs.var_a_label: Number of batches for which at least 1 feedback is available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of batches launched across all training centres

evidence_needed: student response forms/ reports made by DSC representative...

title: District has a functional mechanism for capturing employer feedback and takes corrective action

rubric_options.text: No such mechanism.
Feedback taken from few employers in unstructured manner
Feedback taken from less than 10% employers using structured questionnaire
Feedback taken from more than 10% employers using structured questionnaire and evidence of corrective actions

evidence_needed: No such mechanism.

title: Data on students dropout at TP, faculty and trade level

inputs.var_a_label: Number of students who enrolled for the course but discontinued
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of students who enrolled for short term skill development courses

evidence_needed: Drop Out data on students covering stage, date and reason for D/o

title: 2.3 Placement Analysis
Placement rate of students

inputs.var_a_label: Number of candidates placed above minimum wages
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of candidates that appeared for assessments

evidence_needed: as acceptable by respective program.

title: Wage gap between male and female trainees

inputs.var_a_label: Average fixed salary of women trainees placed
inputs.var_b_label: Average fixed salary of male trainees placed

evidence_needed: Trade wise, TP wise wage gap analysis

title: 2.4 Trainer Development Initiatives
Data on faculty, with certification and profile details available

inputs.var_a_label: Number of centres for which faculty details are available
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of centres operational in district

rubric_level_descriptions: for less than 50% of the centres
evidence_needed: Centre wise list of active faculty members with profile details...

title: District has a mechanism for facilitating professional interaction among faculty...

rubric_options.text: No such mechanism. No structured faculty - industry engagement organised by DSC
DSC has organised industry- faculty interactions for at least one sector but less than 3 sectors
DSC has organised industry- faculty interactions for more than 3 sectors...

evidence_needed: Mails, attendance sheets, report of such interactions...

title: 2.5 Mobilisation and Aptitude Test
DSC has been able to coordinate mobilisation and counselling activities

rubric_options.text: No mobilisation camps organised by DSC in past 1 year
DSC has successfully organised at least 1 mobilisation camp in the past year
DSC has successfully organised mobilisation camps in each block...

evidence_needed: Report made by DSC committee members/ Mail exchanges...

title: DSC has been able to establish a process of regular Aptitude Testing and Counselling

rubric_options.text: DSC does not have a process of conducting aptitude test and counselling
DSC has successfully organised aptitude testing and counselling

evidence_needed: Report made by DSC committee members/ Mail exchanges...

title: 2.6 Industry and Ecosystem Connect
Percentage of DSC meetings which had Industry Representation

inputs.var_a_label: Number of meetings of DSC where Industry Representatives were present
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of DSC meetings held

evidence_needed: Report made by DSC committee members/ Mail exchanges...

title: % of trainees joined as apprentices from the district out of total trainees

inputs.var_a_label: Number of trainees from STT system who joined as apprentices
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of trainees passing out of all short term training programs

evidence_needed: Data on NAPS portal...

title: DSC organises regular consultation workshops and meetings with industry...

rubric_options.text: NIL
Organized at least 1 consultations/ workshops...
Organized at least 2 consultations/ workshops...
Organized at least 3 consultations/ workshops...
Organized at least 4 consultations/ workshops...
Organized 5 or more than 5 consultations...

title: DSC has signed job opportunity MOUs signed with various employers

inputs.var_a_label: Number of vacancies for which annual MOU signed
inputs.var_b_label: Total number of trainees passing out...

title: Component 3: Improved Access and Completion of Skill Training for Women and Other Disadvantaged Groups
3.1 Improved Access and Completion for SC
Ratio between SC youth (16-25) share in trainees and SC youth share in population

inputs.var_a_label: SC share in trainees
inputs.var_b_label: SC share in youth population

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data and Census data adjusted for age

title: Ratio between SC youth (16-25) share in placements and SC youth share in Trainees

inputs.var_a_label: SC share in Placements
inputs.var_b_label: SC share in Trainees

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data and Census data adjusted for age

title: 3.2 Improved Access and Completion for ST
Ratio between ST youth (16-25) share in trainees and ST youth share in population

inputs.var_a_label: ST share in trainees
inputs.var_b_label: ST share in youth population

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data and Census data adjusted for age

title: Ratio between ST youth (16-25) share in placements and ST youth share in Trainees

inputs.var_a_label: ST share in Placements
inputs.var_b_label: ST share in Trainees

title: 3.3 Improved Access and Completion for Other disadvantaged groups and Minorities
Pilots done/ New initiatives taken for enhancing inclusion of other disadvantaged groups

rubric_options.text: No pilots done/ No initiatives taken
Pilot done and detailed Report on same available

evidence_needed: Yes

title: Ratio between minority and other disadvantaged group youth share in trainees...

inputs.var_a_label: Minority... share in trainees
inputs.var_b_label: Minority share in youth population

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data and Census data...

title: Ratio between minority youth share in placements and Minority youth share in Trainees

inputs.var_a_label: Minority... share in placements
inputs.var_b_label: Minority... share in trainees

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data...

title: 3.4 Improved Access and Completion for Women
Ratio between Women youth share in trainees and women youth share in population

inputs.var_a_label: Women share in trainees
inputs.var_b_label: Women share in youth population

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data...

title: Ratio between Women youth share in placements and Women share in Trainees

inputs.var_a_label: Women share in Placements
inputs.var_b_label: Women share in Trainees

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data...

title: 3.5 Improved Access and Completion for PwD
Ratio of Number of PwD trainees trained per 1000 trainees to Number of PwD per 1000 population

inputs.var_a_label: PwD share in trainees
inputs.var_b_label: PwD share in youth population

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data...

title: Ratio of Number of PwD trainees placed per 1000 trainees placed to Number of PwD trainees per 1000 trainees

inputs.var_a_label: PwD share in Placements
inputs.var_b_label: PwD share in Trainees

evidence_needed: Program Manager Data...
